messages.title: THE STRONG VOICE FOR US
messages.content: Fighting against Hard Brexit, Standing up for the NHS, Opposing school cuts

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in our area. Schools in Nottingham are set to lose more than £26 million from their budgets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The tactical voting information highlights that in the 2015 elections, the Conservatives were 41 votes ahead of the Liberal Democrats, with Labour significantly ahead. The leaflet presents a chart suggesting that only the Liberal Democrats can beat Labour in Nottingham North.

images.caption: Tad Jones with a backdrop of a cityscape, presumably Nottingham
